body: You move your enemies within a beam of righteous energy.
name: Improved Channel Force
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Aasimars/New Racial Rules/Aasimar Feats/Improved Channel Force

sections.body: When using Channel Force, you can affect all creatures in a 60-foot line or a 30-foot cone-shaped burst. You must choose to either push or pull all creatures within the affected area that fail their saves.
sections.name: Benefit
